<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet"><sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_snc_emergency_al.Emergency Alert GlideRecord Query Results</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Emergency Alert GlideRecord Query Results</name><output_schema>[
{
    "name": "result",
    "label": "Result",
    "description": "Result",
    "origin": {
       "type": "data",
       "id": "result"
    }
  },
 {
    "name": "items",
    "label": "Items",
    "description": "Items",
    "origin": {
       "type": "data",
       "id": "items"
    }
  }
]</output_schema><private>false</private><props>[
    {
        "name": "query",
        "label": "Query result",
        "description": "Query result from GraphQL GlideRecord Query",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "object",
        "mandatory": true,
       "defaultValue": ""
    },
    {
        "name": "first",
        "label": "First",
        "description": "Take the first item from arrays of length 1",
        "readOnly": false,
        "fieldType": "boolean",
        "mandatory": true,
       "defaultValue": true
    }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"First","comment":""},{"message":"Query result","comment":""},{"message":"Take the first item from arrays of length 1","comment":""},{"message":"Query result from GraphQL GlideRecord Query","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	gs.info(JSON.stringify(input));
	var envLogger = scriptlet;	
	
	// depth first search for _results array field
	function _recursFindKey(obj, key) {
		if (typeof(obj) !== "object" || typeof(key) !== "string") {
			envLogger.print("Get Results transform error: invalid input for property " + key + " (type: " + typeof(key) + ")");
			return null;
		}
		for (var k in obj) {
			if (k == key) 
				return obj[k];
			
			var child = obj[k];
			if (typeof(child) !== 'object')
				continue;
			
			var result = _recursFindKey(child, key);
			if (result != null)
				return result;
		}
		return null;
	}
	
	var results = _recursFindKey(input.query, "_results");
	if (!results)
		return [ "Get Results transform error: invalid input param. Expected to find property '_results'" ];
	
	// un pack first item if array length == 1
	if (results.length == 1 && input.first == true) {
		var result = results[0];
		var tableMetadata = _recursFindKey(input.query, "_table_metadata");
		if (tableMetadata)
			result["_table_metadata"] = tableMetadata;
		return result;
	}
	
	return results;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rakesh</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-20 06:58:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>5e642992dba82010a92f5a75dc9619e9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Emergency Alert GlideRecord Query Results</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Emergency Alert" source="x_snc_emergency_al">2962137651c42010f8776b3ef04affc3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Emergency Alert">2962137651c42010f8776b3ef04affc3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet_5e642992dba82010a92f5a75dc9619e9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rakesh</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-20 07:00:32</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet></record_update>
